summary: Diff implements base-path-aware routing and asset URL handling (TanStack Router basepath + asset helper), updates PWA references to be relative, adds an Internet Identity well-known file, and adds a custom-domain setup guide. The guide appears incomplete and lacks the requested troubleshooting section. Several unrelated UI/content changes are also described in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a short, user-facing documentation page/file explaining how to connect a custom domain (DNS records, served domain, and any required Internet Identity .well-known file(s) plus how to verify they are reachable), including a troubleshooting section.
missing_requirements.reason: A guide file was added, but it appears truncated/incomplete (ends at "Using dfx CLI:"), does not clearly include the requested troubleshooting section, and does not clearly provide complete Internet Identity well-known verification instructions in the visible content.

hallucinated_features.description: Add a new "YouTube" navigation item in the primary navigation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-17–REQ-20 (custom domain compatibility, PWA paths, II well-known file, documentation).

hallucinated_features.description: Update Admissions page program selection to include Class 9th-12th and defence exams (NDA, CDSE, AFCAT, etc.).
Update Contact page content and add copy-to-clipboard and deep links for WhatsApp/phone dialer.
Implement/adjust ProfileSetupModal behavior and admin/auth-related UI/logic changes (modal loading states, admin guards, login button behavior).
